name: directoryCopy
description: Copies the contents of a directory to a destination directory

params.name: source
params.description: Absolute pathname of directory from which you copy content.

params.name: destination
params.description: Path of the destination directory. If not an absolute path, it is relative to the source directory.

params.name: recurse
params.description: If true, copies the subdirectories, otherwise only the files in the source directory.

params.name: filter
params.description: File extension filter applied, for example, *.cfm. Filter to be used to filter the data copied: - A string that uses "*" as a wildcard, for example, "*.cfm" - a UDF (User defined Function) using the following pattern "functioname(String path):boolean", the function is run for every single file, if the function returns true, then the file is will be added to the list otherwise it will be omitted.

params.name: createPath
params.description: Lucee4.5+ If set to false, expects all parent directories to exist. If set to true, it will generate necessary directories.

examples.title: Simple DirectoryCopy Example
examples.description: Copy directory from one place to another.
